name: MOOMaskedIconView
summary: UIView subclass that uses black-and-white masks to draw icons.
description: MOOMaskedIconView is a UIView subclass that uses black-and-white masks to draw icons of different styles at any size or resolution. It's like Photoshop layer styles, using the same technique as UITabBar to generate various effects from a single icon mask. MOOMaskedIconView displays common image formats and PDFs.
